name: LICHY'S TOWER
description:
What the Furr! A gigantic tower appeared nearby Lalo's kingdom. The tower seems to have strong esotheric influences on the floating lands. Try climibing up these wicked floors, filled with fun and challenging puzzles. 

In every level you will encounter a group of enemies. In order to get to the next level you will need to annihilate every form of life in these rooms. To do so rushing with that big old sword into them will suffice. But be prepared cause this tower has more than one trick up its sleeve. 

Each room consists of tiles in which a curse awakens once you step over them. When the curse is active you can't walk back, as they are unstable.  Every enemy has its own pattern of actions which is up to you to understand and discover. These actions will always be the same, and will always happen after you move to any walkable space. 

Do you feel brave and smart enough to challenge this almost living tower?  Then go and download Lichy's Tower 1.0 On PC Or on Mobile Android.
